name: Mask Up!
description:
This is a game that I made for my intro to game programming class.

Those pesky people without masks, always getting in the way when you have to go somewhere. Your goal is to get to the train station and make your way home! Watch out! Apparently, there is a giant germ approaching from behind... it would probably be best if you hurried home quickly... avoiding traffic mind you!

Controls:

WASD - Move
